name: Chrome
description: Would like to use Arc or Firefox, but Chrome works best for both personal and work. Might move over to Thorium to get away from Google.

name: VS Code
description: I will sometimes NeoVim for quick fixes.

name: Ghostty
description: Trying it out as a replacement for Warp and WezTerm, which are both great terminal emulators.

name: Obsidian
description: Use it for all my notes.

name: Proton Mail, Pass, and Drive
description: Went with Proton when I degoogled and have been happy with it for a few years now.

name: OVPN
description: Using it as a work VPN, but also for personal use.

name: Feedbin
description: The best way I've found to keep up with RSS feeds. It's also where I keep my YouTube subscriptions.

name: Airshow
description: It's my prefered podcast app, mostly because it's build into Feedbin.

name: Raycast
description: I can't imagine using a Mac without it.

name: Apple Music
description: The MacOS app is terrible, so I'm using Cider instead on my MacBook.
